title: The End & the Beginning
episode_desc: Hinata has been intrigued by volleyball ever since seeing the Small Giant playing. After struggling to find a team, he finally get's to go to a tournament three years later for the first time. There they play against Kitagawa Daiichi, a powerhouse middle school, and Kageyama Tobio who is infamously known as the King of the Court. Their match sparks a interesting rivalry between the two. However, a year later, when Hinata joins a high school volleyball team, he finds a new unexpected team mate there.
show_desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player Shouyou, a short boy nicknamed "the small giant," joins his school's volleyball club.

title: Karasuno High School Volleyball Club
episode_desc: After just joining the Karasuno Volleyball team, Hinata is faced with a new obstacle. His middle school rival, Kageyama, is also a potential member of the team. When the disapproving captain arrives, he quickly kicks them out until they can get along.
show_desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player Shouyou, a short boy nicknamed "the small giant," joins his school's volleyball club.

title: The Formidable Ally
episode_desc: With sophomore Tanaka on their side, Hinata and Kageyama are up against freshmen Tsukishima and Yamaguchi and third-year team-captain Sawamura in a three-on-three match.
show_desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player Shouyou, a short boy nicknamed "the small giant," joins his school's volleyball club.

title: The View from the Summit
episode_desc: Kageyama and Hinata both win their places on the team. But when the team's new coach, Ittetsu Takeda arrives, his announcement of a practice match with one of the top volleyball teams in the prefecture has both of them scrambling.
show_desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player Shouyou, a short boy nicknamed "the small giant," joins his school's volleyball club.

title: The Absolute Limit Switch

But triumph is with Karasuno, as they win the match with Kageyama and Hinata's quick spike. Oikawa reflects that it is impossible for someone with no natural talent to beat any volleyball genius, no matter how much they train, strategize or who their teammates are, but he would continue on the path straight ahead of him with everything he's got.

title: Trap

show_desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player Shouyou, a short boy nicknamed "the small giant," joins his school's volleyball club.

title: The Ultimate Challengers
episode_desc: Karasuno are in the midst of the second set against Inarizaki. Karasuno's line of defense begin struggling when Miya Atsumu begins to target his powerful jump float serves at Karasuno's Libero, Yuu Nishinoya.
show_desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player Shouyou, a short boy nicknamed "the small giant," joins his school's volleyball club.

title: Leader
episode_desc: Nearing the end of the second set, Inarizaki begins to make Karasuno lose their momentum when Inarizaki's captain, Kita Shinsuke, makes his first appearance on court.
show_desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player Shouyou, a short boy nicknamed "the small giant," joins his school's volleyball club.

title: Hero
